Analysis Task: Which car model has the highest Miles_per_Gallon?

spec.title: Which car model has the highest Miles_per_Gallon?

correct: The mazda glc has the highest Miles_per_Gallon with 46.6 MPG.
incorrect1: The hi 1200d has the highest Miles_per_Gallon with 9.0 MPG.
incorrect2: The pontiac safari (sw) has the highest Miles_per_Gallon with 13.0 MPG.
incorrect3: The pontiac grand prix has the highest Miles_per_Gallon with 16.0 MPG.
